dc_title_s: The world on Mercator's projection : intermediate series
dc_description_s: Shows steamship routes.  Relief shown by hachures.  Includes portraits of the rulers of the world, flags and seals of various countries in margins.  Ancillary maps: Topographical relief map of the Panama Canal and surrounding territory -- An axial profile of proposed lock canal.  On verso: Historic sketch of the Isthmian Canal. Includes 11 illustrations.|91 x 70 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:73,400,00|General Map Collection
